body:
Peter thinks that his aunt is  badass because…

She hanged out with a gangster

Worked as a stripper and met Ivan Vanko

Dated a men who could read women’s minds

Spend her holiday in Rome with Tony Stark

Ditched womanizer named Alfie

Peter knew him actually but he doesn’t remember

And now May is just an aunt who loves Peter more than anything

tags: the winter soldier has weird feelings
body:
Winter’s Courting

Winter’s confused about his feelings regarding Tony (e.g. the flowers and throwing a bag of blueberries at Tony) so instead of talking to his therapist, mandatory not that he wants one, he goes out and dyes his hair a vibrant blue. Just like all the characters do in movies when they are confused about their lives.


Con: it doesn’t solve anything.

Pro: Tony looks at him more

body:
Paradox (6/?)

Pairings: Tony Stark x Pepper Potts, Tony Stark X OC

Words: 2200

Summary: Eleanor movies into Stark Tower.

Masterlist / Paradox Masterlist / Request Here / Tags are always open

It was two days after the incident in Eleanor’s apartment, and she had finally moved into Stark Tower. Now the only thing left to do was to unpack the remaining boxes, but that could be done later too. It had been a long day and a half, packing all her belongings and then sorting them out, only to start unpacking again. She was dead tired, and knew all too well the sore back she would have for the next day or two.

There were nothing else in the boxes except her clothes and the handful of valuable stuff she owned. The only reason she had so many clothes, was out of spite. They were all bought from her ex-husband’s money and after all that he had done, she was entitled to at least taking with her, her possessions. 

Plopping down onto the couch placed quiet conveniently next to the panoramic windows, she took a deep breath, stretching her tensed muscles.  This was a completely different environment for her, and she felt like a person lost in China with no map available in English. These were unprecedented waters to her, and she didn’t know how to row a boat. She had no idea what was to come her way, she was in this blindfolded. All she knew was she was here to take care of Exton, with nothing more or less.

When she had arrived this morning, at around eight, Tony Stark had already been waiting for her. His standing form in the middle of the room had greeted her as the elevators opened and revealed herself clad in a tan coat, with jeans, her height extended with the heeled boots that she wore. With everything that had taken place previously she had no idea whether to greet him or ignore him, so she awkwardly walked towards him, pausing a few meters behind.

 She had been the first one to break the awkward silence,“Hey.”

 To which his jaw had twitched as if highly irritated and then walked over to her, with his hands locked behind his back. Unknown to her he held a rose in his hands, for a greeting.

 "Welcome.“ He stated, monotonously. 

 "Your room is next to Exton’s nursery, I believe it is best you are with him at all times.”

 "Yes, of course.“ Eleanor replied, knowing what she was there for.

“Their best not be any distractions. Exton is your sole responsibility and nothing else. I will accept absolutely no shortcomings, otherwise the consequences will not be so good. After all you know who I am.” He had warned her indirectly. “You better mind your own business and not interfere in my life.“

 Eleanor had only nodded nervously, not knowing what to respond.

 He walked around her, standing dangerously close behind her. All of a sudden his hand traveled in front of her face, a blood red rose in his hand.

 "Enjoy your stay here.” He stated, as she took a hold of the flower with her shaking hands.

 "Oh, careful.“ He whispered into her ear from behind, “I got this beautiful rose for you. But you see, it wilted on the way, the thorns are still there. You might not realise when something ends up hurting you.”

 He moved away after what seemed like ages, leaving Eleanor still in her place as he took the elevator to his lab. Not even ten minutes in a place supposed to be her new home, and she knew the mental breakdown would come sooner rather than later. The encounter had left her all the more nervous and tensed for this new life, especially Tony’s behaviour towards her. She hoped with time they could at least work together in harmony. So what if it was a contract marriage? The owner of a billion dollar company, and the daughter of a business tycoon, who knew better how to carry out a deal then these two?

 Now a few hours later in the afternoon, she decided it was time that she made it known to the other members of the household aware that she had arrived. More specifically Pepper and her son.

 "Jarvis, where is Exton?“ She asked the artificial intelligence.

 "In Mr. Stark’s lab on the 14th level. Would you like the code to enter?”

 "Yes please.“ She told him, as she made her way to the kitchen, to prepare a bottle of milk before she fed the toddler.

 She’s stood in the open doorway of one of the most expensive labs in the world, not wanting to disturb an untamed lion. But circumstances called for it and so she knocked the glass door.

 Tony lifted his head, diverting his attention the source of noise. "What is it?” He snapped.

 "Exton.“ Eleanor stated. "It’s time to feed him.”

 "He is in the play pen.“ He answered and then diverted his attention back to the DNA particles he was studying in the holograms.

 Doing as she was told she carefully picked up the baby. "Hey there little guy!” She cooed before switching to her normal voice, “You know what time is it? Time to fill up the tummy!“ She poked him lightly in the belly, resulting in the boy squealing as he looked up at her hazel eyes with his wide brown ones.

 As she walked out the lab she paused in her steps and turned around to ask, “Do you want lunch?”

 "No, if I need anything, I’ll take it myself. You do what you are told nothing less and nothing more.“ He rudely refused, not once looking up at her.

 Eleanor already knew this was the kind of response she would get from him and so she didn’t mind. She was expecting at least weeks of behavior like this before they could even try to conduct a civil conversation.

 She decided to take the baby in her arms to see his mother, while he had his food. Entering with a soft knock, Eleanor greeted her sick best friend who seemed to be watching the news with a hey.

 "Hi!” Pepper replied, her voice thin and barely above a whisper. “You came already?”

 "Mr. Stark didn’t tell you?“ Eleanor climbed onto the bed so Exton would be closer to his mother as he latched onto the feeder content with the warm milk.

 "He didn’t say when you were coming.” She coughed at the end casting her a confused glance. “You call him Mr. Stark?”

 "Yeah. Why?“

 "You are going to marry him in a few days.”

 "Pepper listen, Tony has made it clear the only reason he is doing this is because it’s your last wish.“ She paused to fix Exton’s posture while Pepper gently rubbed his fingers against his bare feet. "And he has made sure I know this relationship is nothing more than a contract. Inside these four walls I am nothing more than a woman raising his child.”

 "And you have willingly signed yourself over to this loveless life?“ Pepper asked.

 "I stopped believing in love a long time ago Pep. This life is just like a job. Every day you wake up to please the boss above, if he doesn’t want something for you it’s not going to happen no matter what. And I stopped trying years ago.”

 "Eleanor, “she sighed.

 "I have got nothing else to live for anymore. The day he says he wants me out, I will leave. No questions asked.“ El softly explained.

 "But you.” Pepper took a deep breath,“ You have to live the life I can’t. You have Exton and Tony to live for.” She coughed. “You are not alone. Not anymore.”

 "Only time can tell Pep. Only time. Never in a million years had I thought I would be where I am right now.“

 "You need to tell him everything."  Pepper stated, making Eleanor snap her head towards the redhead from where she stood now trying to burp the child in her arms.

 "No, never. “Eleanor passed her verdict without hesitance.

 "But-”

 "No Pepper, at least not now, only when it is the right time.“

 "The time is never right.” She huffed lightly turning her head to look out of the windows.

 "Exactly.“

 "Okay, but one day you will need to tell him.”

 "We will see Pepper, now Exton is falling asleep. Shall I lay him down next to you while I go and unpack my clothes?“

 "Yes, please.”’

 "Tell me if he wakes up or starts crying, I know that-,“ Eleanor stopped herself, the next part would hurt her friend.

 "That I can’t pick up my son to comfort him?” Her voice cracked.

 "I’m sorry I didn’t mean that.“

 "It’s the truth. And the truth always hurts.” She parted her lips, “Not your fault.“

 It was almost eight in the evening when Eleanor finished prepping spaghetti for herself and Tony, and soup for Pepper. She decided it was best to take dinner to her as she had to give her bi-hourly dose.

 She opened the door of Pepper’s room with her elbow due to the tray with the bowl in her hands, almost running into Tony who was apparently exiting. "Watch where you are going.” He scowled, his eyes burning holes into her.

 "Sorry, “She mumbled, stepping aside to make way for him.

 "I brought dinner! “She exclaimed regaining her composure, to Pepper who was propped on her side with the help of pillows as Exton played with toys next to her his back too supported by the pillows behind it.

 "Oh god!“ Pepper groaned to the best of her abilities. "Not that forsaken broth again.”

 "No, I made broccoli soup.“ Eleanor reassured her while placing the tray onto the side table.

 "I saw your weekly meal plans. How do you survive?” Eleanor teased her, helping Pepper to sit up.

 "Can’t digest solids.“ The sick woman provided an explanation as Eleanor tucked a napkin into her shoulder.

 "I know I was teasing.” She explained, blowing on the soup to cool it down for the redhead to digest.

 Eleanor helped Pepper eat her dinner in silence, especially because of the sleeping infant next to them.

 Soon enough Pepper had taken her medicines and was preparing to sleep while Eleanor carried Exton into his nursery, right beside her bedroom, where he could sleep peacefully in the crib after taking a bath and changing into his onesies. Brushing away the soft brown curls that fell onto his forehead Eleanor kissed the child she was now supposed to be the mother of wishing him all the best in the world. She made sure the small blanket covered him properly before asking Jarvis to dim the lights and inform her if his sleep was disturbed.

 She gently closed the door behind her, looking down onto the watch on her wrist. Half past nine. Perfect time to serve dinner she thought to herself as she made her way over the kitchen downstairs to prepare a tray to take to her to-be husband in the lab. 

 While she made her way to the lab down the stairs, the doors automatically slid open for her. Standing in the doorway she waited for the billionaire take note of her presence but it seemed like he was way too focused on whatever research he was conduction.

 "Ahem,“she cleared her throat.

 Finally, he spun around on his chair. “Do you not understand the meaning of privacy or the simple concept of leave me the fuck alone.” He seemed pretty annoyed by her presence.

 "I-I um, there was no one to bring you dinner so I brought it myself.“ Eleanor shuffled on her feet, the tray still in her hands.

 "You don’t need to worry about that. There are hundreds of employees in this building anyone can bring me food. You don’t need to worry your pretty little head about that.”

 "Ok someone else can bring you food from tomorrow, but please take this today.“ Eleanor replied, not an ounce of hurt or disappointment in her voice due to the way he had just spoken to her and walked over the desk he was working on, and placed the tray in an empty area.

 Without sticking around anymore she quickly and quietly makes her way up the stairs. 

 A loud crash is heard when she is only on the third step. She flinches at the sound of glass clashing against the hard marble, knowing well enough he had pushed it off the desk.

 "I said, I don’t want your food.” She heard him shout behind her.

 She only took a deep breath and resumed climbing the stairs her heels clicking against the floor. This was the first of many steps to make him at least somewhat comfortable with her presence in the house.  There was so much more coming her way and she had to prepare for it.

She was dead tired, and knew all too well the sore back she would have for the next day or two.

There were nothing else in the boxes except her clothes and the handful of valuable stuff she owned. The only reason she had so many clothes, was out of spite. They were all bought from her ex-husband’s money and after all that he had done, she was entitled to at least taking with her, her possessions. 

Plopping down onto the couch placed quiet conveniently next to the panoramic windows, she took a deep breath, stretching her tensed muscles.  This was a completely different environment for her, and she felt like a person lost in China with no map available in English. These were unprecedented waters to her, and she didn’t know how to row a boat. She had no idea what was to come her way, she was in this blindfolded. All she knew was she was here to take care of Exton, with nothing more or less.

When she had arrived this morning, at around eight, Tony Stark had already been waiting for her. His standing form in the middle of the room had greeted her as the elevators opened and revealed herself clad in a tan coat, with jeans, her height extended with the heeled boots that she wore. With everything that had taken place previously she had no idea whether to greet him or ignore him, so she awkwardly walked towards him, pausing a few meters behind.

 She had been the first one to break the awkward silence,“Hey.”

 To which his jaw had twitched as if highly irritated and then walked over to her, with his hands locked behind his back. Unknown to her he held a rose in his hands, for a greeting.

 "Welcome.“ He stated, monotonously. 

 "Your room is next to Exton’s nursery, I believe it is best you are with him at all times.”

 "Yes, of course.“ Eleanor replied, knowing what she was there for.

“Their best not be any distractions. Exton is your sole responsibility and nothing else. I will accept absolutely no shortcomings, otherwise the consequences will not be so good. After all you know who I am.” He had warned her indirectly. “You better mind your own business and not interfere in my life.“

 Eleanor had only nodded nervously, not knowing what to respond.

 He walked around her, standing dangerously close behind her. All of a sudden his hand traveled in front of her face, a blood red rose in his hand.

 "Enjoy your stay here.” He stated, as she took a hold of the flower with her shaking hands.

 "Oh, careful.“ He whispered into her ear from behind, “I got this beautiful rose for you. But you see, it wilted on the way, the thorns are still there. You might not realise when something ends up hurting you.”

 He moved away after what seemed like ages, leaving Eleanor still in her place as he took the elevator to his lab. Not even ten minutes in a place supposed to be her new home, and she knew the mental breakdown would come sooner rather than later. The encounter had left her all the more nervous and tensed for this new life, especially Tony’s behaviour towards her. She hoped with time they could at least work together in harmony. So what if it was a contract marriage? The owner of a billion dollar company, and the daughter of a business tycoon, who knew better how to carry out a deal then these two?

 Now a few hours later in the afternoon, she decided it was time that she made it known to the other members of the household aware that she had arrived. More specifically Pepper and her son.

 "Jarvis, where is Exton?“ She asked the artificial intelligence.

 "In Mr. Stark’s lab on the 14th level. Would you like the code to enter?”

 "Yes please.“ She told him, as she made her way to the kitchen, to prepare a bottle of milk before she fed the toddler.

 She’s stood in the open doorway of one of the most expensive labs in the world, not wanting to disturb an untamed lion. But circumstances called for it and so she knocked the glass door.

 Tony lifted his head, diverting his attention the source of noise. "What is it?” He snapped.

 "Exton.“ Eleanor stated. "It’s time to feed him.”

 "He is in the play pen.“ He answered and then diverted his attention back to the DNA particles he was studying in the holograms.

 Doing as she was told she carefully picked up the baby. "Hey there little guy!” She cooed before switching to her normal voice, “You know what time is it? Time to fill up the tummy!“ She poked him lightly in the belly, resulting in the boy squealing as he looked up at her hazel eyes with his wide brown ones.

 As she walked out the lab she paused in her steps and turned around to ask, “Do you want lunch?”

 "No, if I need anything, I’ll take it myself. You do what you are told nothing less and nothing more.“ He rudely refused, not once looking up at her.

 Eleanor already knew this was the kind of response she would get from him and so she didn’t mind. She was expecting at least weeks of behavior like this before they could even try to conduct a civil conversation.

 She decided to take the baby in her arms to see his mother, while he had his food. Entering with a soft knock, Eleanor greeted her sick best friend who seemed to be watching the news with a hey.

 "Hi!” Pepper replied, her voice thin and barely above a whisper. “You came already?”

 "Mr. Stark didn’t tell you?“ Eleanor climbed onto the bed so Exton would be closer to his mother as he latched onto the feeder content with the warm milk.

 "He didn’t say when you were coming.” She coughed at the end casting her a confused glance. “You call him Mr. Stark?”

 "Yeah. Why?“

 "You are going to marry him in a few days.”

 "Pepper listen, Tony has made it clear the only reason he is doing this is because it’s your last wish.“ She paused to fix Exton’s posture while Pepper gently rubbed his fingers against his bare feet. "And he has made sure I know this relationship is nothing more than a contract. Inside these four walls I am nothing more than a woman raising his child.”

 "And you have willingly signed yourself over to this loveless life?“ Pepper asked.

 "I stopped believing in love a long time ago Pep. This life is just like a job. Every day you wake up to please the boss above, if he doesn’t want something for you it’s not going to happen no matter what. And I stopped trying years ago.”

 "Eleanor, “she sighed.

 "I have got nothing else to live for anymore. The day he says he wants me out, I will leave. No questions asked.“ El softly explained.

 "But you.” Pepper took a deep breath,“ You have to live the life I can’t. You have Exton and Tony to live for.” She coughed. “You are not alone. Not anymore.”

 "Only time can tell Pep. Only time. Never in a million years had I thought I would be where I am right now.“

 "You need to tell him everything."  Pepper stated, making Eleanor snap her head towards the redhead from where she stood now trying to burp the child in her arms.

 "No, never. “Eleanor passed her verdict without hesitance.

 "But-”

 "No Pepper, at least not now, only when it is the right time.“

 "The time is never right.” She huffed lightly turning her head to look out of the windows.

 "Exactly.“

 "Okay, but one day you will need to tell him.”

 "We will see Pepper, now Exton is falling asleep. Shall I lay him down next to you while I go and unpack my clothes?“

 "Yes, please.”’

 "Tell me if he wakes up or starts crying, I know that-,“ Eleanor stopped herself, the next part would hurt her friend.

 "That I can’t pick up my son to comfort him?” Her voice cracked.

 "I’m sorry I didn’t mean that.“

 "It’s the truth. And the truth always hurts.” She parted her lips, “Not your fault.“

 It was almost eight in the evening when Eleanor finished prepping spaghetti for herself and Tony, and soup for Pepper. She decided it was best to take dinner to her as she had to give her bi-hourly dose.

 She opened the door of Pepper’s room with her elbow due to the tray with the bowl in her hands, almost running into Tony who was apparently exiting. "Watch where you are going.” He scowled, his eyes burning holes into her.

 "Sorry, “She mumbled, stepping aside to make way for him.

 "I brought dinner! “She exclaimed regaining her composure, to Pepper who was propped on her side with the help of pillows as Exton played with toys next to her his back too supported by the pillows behind it.

 "Oh god!“ Pepper groaned to the best of her abilities. "Not that forsaken broth again.”

 "No, I made broccoli soup.“ Eleanor reassured her while placing the tray onto the side table.

 "I saw your weekly meal plans. How do you survive?” Eleanor teased her, helping Pepper to sit up.

 "Can’t digest solids.“ The sick woman provided an explanation as Eleanor tucked a napkin into her shoulder.

 "I know I was teasing.” She explained, blowing on the soup to cool it down for the redhead to digest.

 Eleanor helped Pepper eat her dinner in silence, especially because of the sleeping infant next to them.

 Soon enough Pepper had taken her medicines and was preparing to sleep while Eleanor carried Exton into his nursery, right beside her bedroom, where he could sleep peacefully in the crib after taking a bath and changing into his onesies. Brushing away the soft brown curls that fell onto his forehead Eleanor kissed the child she was now supposed to be the mother of wishing him all the best in the world. She made sure the small blanket covered him properly before asking Jarvis to dim the lights and inform her if his sleep was disturbed.

 She gently closed the door behind her, looking down onto the watch on her wrist. Half past nine. Perfect time to serve dinner she thought to herself as she made her way over the kitchen downstairs to prepare a tray to take to her to-be husband in the lab. 

 While she made her way to the lab down the stairs, the doors automatically slid open for her. Standing in the doorway she waited for the billionaire take note of her presence but it seemed like he was way too focused on whatever research he was conduction.

 "Ahem,“she cleared her throat.

 Finally, he spun around on his chair. “Do you not understand the meaning of privacy or the simple concept of leave me the fuck alone.” He seemed pretty annoyed by her presence.

 "I-I um, there was no one to bring you dinner so I brought it myself.“ Eleanor shuffled on her feet, the tray still in her hands.

 "You don’t need to worry about that. There are hundreds of employees in this building anyone can bring me food. You don’t need to worry your pretty little head about that.”

 "Ok someone else can bring you food from tomorrow, but please take this today.“ Eleanor replied, not an ounce of hurt or disappointment in her voice due to the way he had just spoken to her and walked over the desk he was working on, and placed the tray in an empty area.

 Without sticking around anymore she quickly and quietly makes her way up the stairs. 

 A loud crash is heard when she is only on the third step. She flinches at the sound of glass clashing against the hard marble, knowing well enough he had pushed it off the desk.

 "I said, I don’t want your food.” She heard him shout behind her.

 She only took a deep breath and resumed climbing the stairs her heels clicking against the floor. This was the first of many steps to make him at least somewhat comfortable with her presence in the house.  There was so much more coming her way and she had to prepare for it.

summary: 130+ MCU fics I would/have read more than once
title: 130+ MCU fics I would/have read more than once
body:
This is excessively long, so I’m posting it with a “read more” so that if it gets reblogged it doesn’t clog up dashboards.

(I did the math and this is literally about 90% father/son relationship (like actually father son not gross) Tony and Peter fics, so if that’s not your cup of tea I would suggest moving on?)

I’ve included titles and brief summaries of each fic in my own words. The fics are roughly categorized, either by “trope that I wasn’t aware I was obsessed with until now” or word count.

Ship fics

Kisses
Thorbruce fic; literally just cutesy kisses.

Bruce wakes up on the ship after Thor is forced to start Ragnarok and evacuate Asgard

A Bot’s Beautiful Mess
Rhodey asks Dum-E to hide the ring he bought for Tony. Of course, it’s Dum-E, so it doesn’t exactly go to plan. (Dum-E’s POV; so funny)

Trust
This is sort of shippy, and sort of just Tony getting de-aged to 15 in a fight and freaking out until Rhodey comes to the rescue because he knows Rhodey from MIT already.

Ridiculous
Pepper informs Rhodey of the obvious: he and Tony are completely ridiculous.

Run and Hide
High School AU. Tony’s got a huge crush on Rhodey, and the Homecoming dance is coming up. Only thing is, he’s scared to do anything about it.

Reasons Why
Rhodey finds Tony after the Battle of New York.

Field Trip fics

Tony Stark, Chaperone Extraordinaire
Tony chaperones Peter’s field trip to the science museum.

Academic Commitment
Peter’s class goes on a field trip and things go ever so slightly wrong.

Stark Internship

The Field Trip
The Tower gets broken into and Peter has to do something about it (without Spider-Man).

It Could Have Been Worse

A Little Help Goes A Long Way

Dysfunctional
Peter gets caught up in a whole mess of the impending doom of a field trip to his current place of residence and internship, and busting an old Hydra facility.

Of ID Badges and Artificial Intelligence
Midtown’s field trip to SI nearly turns Peter’s life into a nightmare, but fortunately there are occasionally things that work out in his favor.

It’s Above My Clearance Level

“Peter is biologically Tony’s kid” fics

i’m the satellite (and you’re the sky)
Tony is actually Peter’s dad. (Chaptered)

We are human after all
More of the same because I found out who dies in Infinity War and I am Not Happy. (Series; first part chaptered, sequel oneshots)

My Son, My Sun
A baby gets dropped on Tony’s doorstep just before the events of Iron Man. He doesn’t want anything to do with the kid until he’s kidnapped in Afghanistan and realizes that for the first time maybe in his life… he has a family to go home to. (Contains Stony)

Kid fics

Peter Parker’s Homecoming
Domestic AU where Peter gets adopted by Tony and Stephen Stark-Strange.

Spider-Baby of mine
Frickin’ adorable oneshot of de-aged baby Peter being coddled and smooched by pretty much all of the Avengers (especially Tony, because duh).

My boy
Tony’s no good with kids, but a sad little boy on a field trip to SI might change his mind.

The Face In The Papers
Tony just wanted to get a Captain America Happy Meal for his kid. The press has other plans.

Under the weather
Baby(toddler-ish) Peter gets the flu and Tony flies halfway across the world to be there for him (contains Stony).

Baby Maybe
3 year old Peter has a nightmare and wakes up crying.

MIT-era fics

Masquerading as a Man with a Reason
Let’s just say Teenage College Student Tony was a bit of a walking nightmare. Being his roommate is basically just being a glorified babysitter. See also: The Noodle Incident. (Part of a series featuring Tony adopting Peter; I wasn’t wild about the series itself, but I loved this oneshot.)

Deposit Security
Socially awkward college baby Tony evidently needs a lot of positive reinforcement. Rhodey’s pretty good at giving it.

Falling Head Over Heels For You
Soulmate AU. Tony has a recurring feeling that makes him do weird things trying to follow it, and more often than not it results in him falling on the floor and taking whatever happens to be a little too close down with him.

Holiday fics

messy chocolate frosting
Peter’s birthday

Tony Stark’s Epic Birthday Bash
Peter enlists the Avengers to help plan a birthday party for Tony

99 red balloons
Tony’s birthday

Happy Birthday, Tony!
Tony’s birthday

Happy Father’s Day!
….Father’s Day

I don’t really think that’s criticism
Father’s Day

of jaws and birthdays
It’s Peter’s birthday, and there’s some fun stuff planned for him, but first he has go get his jaw reset. Yay.

Series

Irondad and Spiderson (fave)
MCU series about Tony being a father figure for Peter.

Iron Dad & Spider-Son
Much like the above.

what you were then I am today
The story of Tony’s struggle to connect with Peter when he adopts him after May dies. They adopt Maggie the Wonder Dog, for starters.

Baby Mine
12 chapters plus a oneshot alternate ending of de-aged baby Peter being and coddled and smooched, this time mostly by Tony… and Happy, if you can believe it. A little bit of angst, as well, but only for a couple chapters.

Peter Parker: Future Hearts
Series mostly about Peter’s relationship with the Avengers, but also Tony adopting him when May dies; can get pretty angsty at some parts.

The Post-IW Life
What it says on the tin.

Exposed
A series about various ways Peter accidentally tells everyone he’s Spider-Man.

Because Peter’s Basically Tony’s Son
Series, ongoing (oneshots)

Peter & Bucky Are Pals
Cute series of Peter befriending Bucky… sort of on accident. There’s also a Hair Club and Peter Protection Service.

Peter Parker Is Bisexual
Peter opens up to Tony about something, and Tony is very supportive (and also gleefully teasing) (it’s really cute and silly, it’s just Tony tickling Peter and teasing him about his crush and then his date and then his boyfriend)

Avenger Adventures
The Avengers’ observances of Tony and Peter’s apparent father-son relationship

Asexual!Peter
Tony helps Peter settle into the identity that he’s just now learning doesn’t make him defective.

Let The World Know (Peter Is Tony’s Son)
A collection of unrelated oneshots, ranging from Peter being biologically Tony and Pepper’s son, to Tony acting as a father figure. There’s something for everyone in here, honestly.

Chaptered fics

My Soul To Keep
Movie night after the events of Infinity War (plus events of the author’s post-film hcs).

Stay in School, Kid
The Avengers teach a week-long workshop at Peter’s high school, and he hates it… at first. MJ helps him out a bit.

5 Times Peter Thought Tony Was Mad
Tony loves his exasperating kid.

Hulk Friend!
Peter befriends Hulk (in the cutest way possible) because he knows a lonely 5 year old when he sees one.

the rattle of their hearts
The author’s take on Infinity War part 2 (it’s so so good but also so so long and I regret reading it all in one night)

And You’ll Blow Us All Away
May dies and Tony adopts Peter, featuring almost 60,000 words and a whole lotta angst. But also a lot of fluff.

Dad for a Day
It’s “take your dad to school for the science fair” day. Peter doesn’t think it’s gonna be a very fun day for him, until he tells Tony about it.

Iconic
Peter and Shuri are introduced and the Gen Z Vine Meme Twins are born.

I’m Right Here
Peter comes back from the dead after Thanos is defeated, gets upset and sick, and basically just gets babied, coddled, and reassured by various Avengers, particularly Tony, Steve, and Bucky, on the ship back to Earth.

5+1 fics

5 Times Everyone Thought Spider-Man was Iron Man’s Favorite Superhero
Plus one time Tony confirmed it.

Eggshells
5 times Peter indulged in his stress baking habit, and 1 time Tony did it for him.

Five Times Peter was Tony’s Son and One Time Tony was his Dad
5+1 of Tony accidentally (then on purpose) being Peter’s dad.

Carry On Wayward Son
The Avengers are desperate to know who it is that Stark is trying to protect.

5 Times Peter is stuck with Tony
5+1 of Tony and Peter getting stuck in various places (It’s mostly hilarious, with some angst added in just for balance).

Four Times Steve Didn’t Meet Peter
Steve has never met Tony’s kid, but he’s already fond of him.

The Five Times Peter Denies an Illness or Injury + the One Time He Doesn’t
Peter doesn’t like admitting it when he’s sick.

Long oneshots (5000+)

Spider gone rogue
Peter feels suffocated by parental control and hacks his suit for a few days and bad things happen.

A Night To Remember
MJ asks Peter to prom.

Serendipity
May breaks her leg so Peter stays with Tony (it ends with [happy-not-tragic-situation] adoption; good stuff).

Who Saves The Hero
May’s new boyfriend makes Peter uncomfortable. He finds out why soon enough.

and then redemption
Peter accidentally befriends Loki. Flash is a not-so-closet Spiderman fan.

Packing Heat
Flash gives Peter a lot of crap for being trans. Tony’s not here for that at all.

A Different Sky
Tony and Peter go on a mission in the Midwest. Peter’s never seen the stars. Tony hates the sky. They stargaze.

Coming Home
5+1 where everyone assumes Ned and Peter are dating, but they’re not (until they are)

A Cautionary Tale
Peter makes a mistake on a mission and gets hurt. Tony reacts pretty badly.

…I’m in Love
Karen suggests Peter has a crush. On Ned. And now he can’t stop thinking about it.

The mind melt
Peter’s got a horrific fever.

If You Can’t Catch A Breath (You Can Take The Oxygen Straight Out Of My Own Chest)
A villain buries Peter alive, leaving Tony rushing to get him out before he runs out of oxygen.

Bold Enough To Fall On My Face When I Walk
Peter gets hurt doing something Tony very specifically told him not to do.

5 Times Peter Sleepwalked And The 1 Time He Pretended He Did
Peter sleepwalks. It’s absolutely, without question, the cutest problem Tony has ever had to deal with.

A Tool (To Save Yourself)
Tony has an idea to make something to help Peter through panic attacks. Peter has an idea to help the rest of the world.

Mid-length oneshots (2500-5000)

Wisdom lost, wisdom found
Peter gets his wisdom teeth pulled and gives the Avengers multiple collective heart attacks while high on pain meds.

Parental Obligations
Peter gets a cold. May’s upstate, so Tony brings him back to the Tower.

drunk spider situation
Peter has a nightmare and deals with it Tony-style… and Tony has to deal with it. (it’s funnier than it sounds.)

star child
Tony takes Peter to Coney Island so he can just be a kid for a while.

1:03 AM
Peter doesn’t want to deal with nightmares so he focuses on everything else and works himself into a panic attack instead.

I Think There’s Been A Little Mix Up
Peter and Tony somehow switch bodies.

Peter’s Science Fair
Tony and Steven (Strange) are married and Peter’s their kid and they surprise him at his science fair

Repeat After Me
Rhodey finds out who Peter is (in a rather unconventional and accidental way)

What Do Sick Teenagers Do?
Peter gets sick and his school doesn’t believe Tony is a legitimate emergency contact.

Sleepless Nights and Restless Dreams
Peter can’t sleep.

To My Son
Being taught to shave by your dad is a teenage boy’s rite of passage… one that Peter didn’t think he would get.

Insomnia
The insomnia is real with these two.

#RoleModelStark2018
Oh look another “Peter returns from the dead” fic

Soccer Mom Moment
Tony’s taking Peter to a conference. Peter needs a haircut.

Have Mercy On Me, Mercy My Heart
Tony tries to figure out what he can do to help Peter.

am i what you wanted
Peter doesn’t want MJ to find out that he’s Spiderman, but things don’t always go according to plan, and he rocks up to movie night at Ned’s with a GSW.

Spider Mom
Nobody expected Peter to turn Natasha into Spider Mom.

Peter Parker’s Top Surgery Fund
Peter and Ned try to raise money for Peter’s top surgery without telling Tony. He finds out anyway. With only minor confusion as to what top surgery is.

You See The Same Eyes In Different People
Peter reminds Bucky a lot of Steve. He gives Bucky the same intense desire to protect.

In A Matter of Minutes
Flash takes a seemingly harmless pool game way too far. Once again, it’s Iron Dad to the rescue.

searching for my father’s power
Tony’s having a rough time, but his little found family helps. Even when Peter is convinced that Tony going into cardiac arrest is his fault.

We’re There, Kid
Tony is possibly the best mentor/almost-parental figure ever, and Peter wonders if they’re at hug-level yet.

The Octopus Files
Peter catches the flu. May warns Tony about Octopus Mode, but doesn’t bother telling him what it means. He finds out soon enough, anyway.

Just Hug Your Father
Ned goads Peter to hug his Tonydad. Peter has a teensy bit of a nervous breakdown.

I Will Soften Every Edge
According to FRIDAY, Tony is Peter’s dad. Not biologically. Just scientifically.

And You’re Miles Away
Some of the phone calls Peter and Tony make to each other during Peter’s first few months of college. (yo, this one actually made me cry a little bit, and I don’t do that very often. some of Peter’s feelings are very similar to feelings I have all the time, and I haven’t even worked up the courage to do any college/adult stuff yet like he has.)

mr. sandman
Steve’s got a big soft spot for the insomniac Spider-Kid.

Not-super-short-but-still-short oneshots (1000-2500)

You’re Okay, Kid
Peter has a stress-induced panic attack and he and Tony play I Spy.

Spidey Senses
Peter’s got horrendous sensory overload.

Into the Driver’s Seat Tonight
Peter’s first driving lesson starts out ok… but it ends in a way that’s less than ideal.

Making A Show of It
Peter asks for an access key to get jerks off his back. Of course, Tony doesn’t do things half-way.

What’s It Called When Spiderman Climbs Walls?
Peter and MJ make it “Instagram Official”.

Clearer from a distance
Peter stopped wearing dresses when he was eight.

Puppy Peter
Loki turns Peter into a beagle puppy

Read U, Wrote U
Peter and MJ watch Drag Race and get drunk, Unfortunately, Peter has been teaching Tony how to use SnapChat… and forgot to block him from viewing his story.

Family for Dummies
Peter catches a cold. Tony’s not a dad, he swears…

Just Smile
It’s been a rough week for the Spiderling (and, hey, apparently RDJ can sing, who knew? not me)

the principle of maximum-happiness
Tony’s life is pretty good right now. And he just got his ten cents’ worth of jabs at Team Cap, so now all he has to worry about is Peter’s small explosion.

Stress Is A Man’s Best Enemy
Stress gets to everybody once in a while. Sometimes there are better ways to handle it.

Then How DO You Explain Peter?
Thor is under the impression that Peter is the result of Tony participating in spider mating season (100% CRACK THIS IS COMPLETELY RIDICULOUS AND IT’S SO FUNNY)

Look What You Made Me Do
Peter found a great way to annoy Loki

Behind the closed doors
Very few people know that Tony has two personas; one public, one private. Peter is one of those few.

it’s called good parenting
For all the Avengers tease Tony about being a dad, they’re not entirely wrong.

his guy in the chair
May and Tony figure out that Peter and Ned are dating… before Peter and Ned do.

see what i see
Tony is furious when he finds out that Peter gets bullied, because how could someone possibly pick on a kid as great as his?

To Feel
Peter comes back from the ashes. It’s not a whole lot of fun.

Thunderbolt and Lightning, Very Very Frightening Me
Peter hates storms.

Sweater Paws and Sweet Pancakes
Tony makes breakfast for his sleepy kid.

It’s a Little Bit We Do
Peter rips his multimillion dollar, knife-proof, Vibranium-infused suit. Tony is surprisingly not mad about it. Plus he gets to put Ross on hold again. That’s always fun.

Hit the Brake
Tony teaches Peter how to drive.

Shelter
Peter comes and snuggles with Tony after a rough night on patrol.

A Flash From the Past
A few years in the future, Flash is applying for a position at SI. Guess who the head of the R&D department is?

there you’ll be
Peter gets his wisdom teeth out and while he’s still on laughing gas, he develops a habit of alternating between making Tony laugh and making him feel all mushy and parental

life ain’t always beautiful
Peter gets his heart broken and goes to Tony seeking comfort.

Breathe with me
Peter has a panic attack when Tony tells him he might be getting another surgery on his heart. Ned helps him calm down.

Short oneshots (-1000)

Hypothetically, I’m a Role Model
Tony asks Clint a “hypothetical” question about kids

Home Again
Everyone comes back to life and there’s father-son crying good stuff

Vine Worthy
Peter is tired and says something embarrassing over the phone to Tony, then crawls into a trash can out of shame. Ned Vines it.

Chilled To The Bone (And Nearly Just As Tired)
Peter is Tony’s son and got a little bit chilly when he was out Spider-Manning

Where are you?
Tony’s presenting at an event and panics when he can’t see Peter (hint: he’s right in front of him, he’s just kinda short).

Starvation and Biscuits
Peter is dramatic, and Wanda has no sympathy. Fortunately, Tony does.

Big Sister Nat
Pepper offered to teach Peter to dance for prom, but she’s unavailable when he swings by (pun somewhat intended). Fortunately she’s not the only woman there.

Hot Cocoa at Home
Peter can’t sleep and goes back out as Spider-Man. Tony gives him seven minutes to get to the Tower before he’s forced to drink two mugs of hot cocoa by himself like a loser.

Whatever a Spider Can
Peter makes a new web formula that might be able to actually catch stuff. Like… people. Let’s just say all Tony wanted for Christmas has now been taken care of.

Incomplete fics

Dear Mr. Stark (or whoever reads his mail)
Peter writes a letter to his hero and ends up stealing the hearts of the head of the mail team, Tony, and pretty much everyone else who hears about it.

He’s My… Intern?
Oneshots of Tony being a dad (even though he’s technically not).

The Tumblr Archives
More of the same (by the same author, they’re really good).

Sun Comes Up, It’s Tuesday Morning
AU where May dies and Peter goes to foster care for 11 months, because he hasn’t met Tony yet, and he basically becomes a street kid to get out of the foster home. Tony finds him on the street one day and immediately decides, “yup, my kid”, without really realizing it.

5 Times Peter Needed Comfort + 1 Time He Already Had It
What it says on the tin.

i’m dedicating every day to you (i’ll do whatever it takes)
Series about Tony and Peter’s developing father-son relationship. Tony helps Peter deal with his “inside stuff” so that he doesn’t have to by himself.

Stark_Intern
Peter is really good at photography, so Tony decides to hook him up with a top-of-the-line phone so his photos can be high-quality in more ways than one. They also engage in Twitter banter. It’s good fun.

Authors

wolfypuppypiles
A favorite for Iron Dad & Spider-Son. There are too many I love to write them all out.

ahsokaa
My fave for Peter/Ned fics

Webtrinsic (formerly DoctorsBadWolf)
Another one for Iron Dad & Spider-Son. Again, too many fun ones to write them out individually. Not amazing grammar, so if that bothers you a lot I’d suggest not going there.

Buckets_Of_Stars
I think this one is my ultimate favorite… you know when parents have like a million and one cutesy pet names for their kids? There are copious amounts of those in this author’s stuff, and I’m in love.

madasthesea
Iron Dad & Spider-Son. What else? (They write for a few other fandoms, as well. I haven’t really read those, but you should take a look and see if you have an interest in any of them, because they write really well.)

mainstreamelectricalparade
This is… this is just me. I’m sorry, I feel obligated to add myself to my own fic rec list, it’s shameless self-promo.
body_abstract:
This is excessively long, so I’m posting it with a “read more” so that if it gets reblogged it doesn’t clog up dashboards.

(I did the math and this is literally about 90% father/son relationship (like actually father son not gross) Tony and Peter fics, so if that’s not your cup of tea I would suggest moving on?)

I’ve included titles and brief summaries of each fic in my own words. The fics are roughly categorized, either by “trope that I wasn’t aware I was obsessed with until now” or word count.

Ship fics

Kisses
Thorbruce fic; literally just cutesy kisses.

Bruce wakes up on the ship after Thor is forced to start Ragnarok and evacuate Asgard

A Bot’s Beautiful Mess
Rhodey asks Dum-E to hide the ring he bought for Tony. Of course, it’s Dum-E, so it doesn’t exactly go to plan. (Dum-E’s POV; so funny)

Trust
This is sort of shippy, and sort of just Tony getting de-aged to 15 in a fight and freaking out until Rhodey comes to the rescue because he knows Rhodey from MIT already.

Ridiculous
Pepper informs Rhodey of the obvious: he and Tony are completely ridiculous.

Run and Hide
High School AU. Tony’s got a huge crush on Rhodey, and the Homecoming dance is coming up. Only thing is, he’s scared to do anything about it.

Reasons Why
Rhodey finds Tony after the Battle of New York.

Field Trip fics

Tony Stark, Chaperone Extraordinaire
Tony chaperones Peter’s field trip to the science museum.

Academic Commitment
Peter’s class goes on a field trip and things go ever so slightly wrong.

Stark Internship

The Field Trip
The Tower gets broken into and Peter has to do something about it (without Spider-Man).

It Could Have Been Worse

A Little Help Goes A Long Way

Dysfunctional
Peter gets caught up in a whole mess of the impending doom of a field trip to his current place of residence and internship, and busting an old Hydra facility.

Of ID Badges and Artificial Intelligence
Midtown’s field trip to SI nearly turns Peter’s life into a nightmare, but fortunately there are occasionally things that work out in his favor.

It’s Above My Clearance Level

“Peter is biologically Tony’s kid” fics

i’m the satellite (and you’re the sky)
Tony is actually Peter’s dad. (Chaptered)

We are human after all
More of the same because I found out who dies in Infinity War and I am Not Happy. (Series; first part chaptered, sequel oneshots)

My Son, My Sun
A baby gets dropped on Tony’s doorstep just before the events of Iron Man. He doesn’t want anything to do with the kid until he’s kidnapped in Afghanistan and realizes that for the first time maybe in his life… he has a family to go home to. (Contains Stony)

Kid fics

Peter Parker’s Homecoming
Domestic AU where Peter gets adopted by Tony and Stephen Stark-Strange.

Spider-Baby of mine
Frickin’ adorable oneshot of de-aged baby Peter being coddled and smooched by pretty much all of the Avengers (especially Tony, because duh).

My boy
Tony’s no good with kids, but a sad little boy on a field trip to SI might change his mind.

The Face In The Papers
Tony just wanted to get a Captain America Happy Meal for his kid. The press has other plans.

Under the weather
Baby(toddler-ish) Peter gets the flu and Tony flies halfway across the world to be there for him (contains Stony).

Baby Maybe
3 year old Peter has a nightmare and wakes up crying.

MIT-era fics

Masquerading as a Man with a Reason
Let’s just say Teenage College Student Tony was a bit of a walking nightmare. Being his roommate is basically just being a glorified babysitter. See also: The Noodle Incident. (Part of a series featuring Tony adopting Peter; I wasn’t wild about the series itself, but I loved this oneshot.)

Deposit Security
Socially awkward college baby Tony evidently needs a lot of positive reinforcement. Rhodey’s pretty good at giving it.

Falling Head Over Heels For You
Soulmate AU. Tony has a recurring feeling that makes him do weird things trying to follow it, and more often than not it results in him falling on the floor and taking whatever happens to be a little too close down with him.

messy chocolate frosting

Clearer from a distance
Peter stopped wearing dresses when he was eight.

Puppy Peter
Loki turns Peter into a beagle puppy

Read U, Wrote U
Peter and MJ watch Drag Race and get drunk, Unfortunately, Peter has been teaching Tony how to use SnapChat… and forgot to block him from viewing his story.

Family for Dummies
Peter catches a cold. Tony’s not a dad, he swears…

Just Smile
It’s been a rough week for the Spiderling (and, hey, apparently RDJ can sing, who knew? not me)

the principle of maximum-happiness
Tony’s life is pretty good right now. And he just got his ten cents’ worth of jabs at Team Cap, so now all he has to worry about is Peter’s small explosion.

Stress Is A Man’s Best Enemy
Stress gets to everybody once in a while. Sometimes there are better ways to handle it.

Then How DO You Explain Peter?
Thor is under the impression that Peter is the result of Tony participating in spider mating season (100% CRACK THIS IS COMPLETELY RIDICULOUS AND IT’S SO FUNNY)

Look What You Made Me Do
Peter found a great way to annoy Loki

Behind the closed doors
Very few people know that Tony has two personas; one public, one private. Peter is one of those few.

it’s called good parenting
For all the Avengers tease Tony about being a dad, they’re not entirely wrong.

his guy in the chair
May and Tony figure out that Peter and Ned are dating… before Peter and Ned do.

see what i see
Tony is furious when he finds out that Peter gets bullied, because how could someone possibly pick on a kid as great as his?

To Feel
Peter comes back from the ashes. It’s not a whole lot of fun.

Thunderbolt and Lightning, Very Very Frightening Me
Peter hates storms.

Sweater Paws and Sweet Pancakes
Tony makes breakfast for his sleepy kid.

It’s a Little Bit We Do
Peter rips his multimillion dollar, knife-proof, Vibranium-infused suit. Tony is surprisingly not mad about it. Plus he gets to put Ross on hold again. That’s always fun.

Hit the Brake
Tony teaches Peter how to drive.

Shelter
Peter comes and snuggles with Tony after a rough night on patrol.

A Flash From the Past
A few years in the future, Flash is applying for a position at SI. Guess who the head of the R&D department is?

there you’ll be
Peter gets his wisdom teeth out and while he’s still on laughing gas, he develops a habit of alternating between making Tony laugh and making him feel all mushy and parental

life ain’t always beautiful
Peter gets his heart broken and goes to Tony seeking comfort.

Breathe with me
Peter has a panic attack when Tony tells him he might be getting another surgery on his heart. Ned helps him calm down.

Short oneshots (-1000)

Hypothetically, I’m a Role Model
Tony asks Clint a “hypothetical” question about kids

Home Again
Everyone comes back to life and there’s father-son crying good stuff

Vine Worthy
Peter is tired and says something embarrassing over the phone to Tony, then crawls into a trash can out of shame. Ned Vines it.

Chilled To The Bone (And Nearly Just As Tired)
Peter is Tony’s son and got a little bit chilly when he was out Spider-Manning

Where are you?
Tony’s presenting at an event and panics when he can’t see Peter (hint: he’s right in front of him, he’s just kinda short).

Starvation and Biscuits
Peter is dramatic, and Wanda has no sympathy. Fortunately, Tony does.

Big Sister Nat
Pepper offered to teach Peter to dance for prom, but she’s unavailable when he swings by (pun somewhat intended). Fortunately she’s not the only woman there.

Hot Cocoa at Home
Peter can’t sleep and goes back out as Spider-Man. Tony gives him seven minutes to get to the Tower before he’s forced to drink two mugs of hot cocoa by himself like a loser.

Whatever a Spider Can
Peter makes a new web formula that might be able to actually catch stuff. Like… people. Let’s just say all Tony wanted for Christmas has now been taken care of.

Incomplete fics

Dear Mr. Stark (or whoever reads his mail)
Peter writes a letter to his hero and ends up stealing the hearts of the head of the mail team, Tony, and pretty much everyone else who hears about it.

He’s My… Intern?
Oneshots of Tony being a dad (even though he’s technically not).

The Tumblr Archives
More of the same (by the same author, they’re really good).

Sun Comes Up, It’s Tuesday Morning
AU where May dies and Peter goes to foster care for 11 months, because he hasn’t met Tony yet, and he basically becomes a street kid to get out of the foster home. Tony finds him on the street one day and immediately decides, “yup, my kid”, without really realizing it.

5 Times Peter Needed Comfort + 1 Time He Already Had It
What it says on the tin.

i’m dedicating every day to you (i’ll do whatever it takes)
Series about Tony and Peter’s developing father-son relationship. Tony helps Peter deal with his “inside stuff” so that he doesn’t have to by himself.

Stark_Intern
Peter is really good at photography, so Tony decides to hook him up with a top-of-the-line phone so his photos can be high-quality in more ways than one. They also engage in Twitter banter. It’s good fun.

Authors

wolfypuppypiles
A favorite for Iron Dad & Spider-Son. There are too many I love to write them all out.

ahsokaa
My fave for Peter/Ned fics

Webtrinsic (formerly DoctorsBadWolf)
Another one for Iron Dad & Spider-Son. Again, too many fun ones to write them out individually. Not amazing grammar, so if that bothers you a lot I’d suggest not going there.

Buckets_Of_Stars
I think this one is my ultimate favorite… you know when parents have like a million and one cutesy pet names for their kids? There are copious amounts of those in this author’s stuff, and I’m in love.

madasthesea
Iron Dad & Spider-Son. What else? (They write for a few other fandoms, as well. I haven’t really read those, but you should take a look and see if you have an interest in any of them, because they write really well.)

mainstreamelectricalparade
This is… this is just me. I’m sorry, I feel obligated to add myself to my own fic rec list, it’s shameless self-promo.

trail.content_raw:
This is excessively long, so I’m posting it with a “read more” so that if it gets reblogged it doesn’t clog up dashboards.

(I did the math and this is literally about 90% father/son relationship (like actually father son not gross) Tony and Peter fics, so if that’s not your cup of tea I would suggest moving on?)

I’ve included titles and brief summaries of each fic in my own words. The fics are roughly categorized, either by “trope that I wasn’t aware I was obsessed with until now” or word count.

[[MORE]]

Ship fics

Kisses
Thorbruce fic; literally just cutesy kisses.

Bruce wakes up on the ship after Thor is forced to start Ragnarok and evacuate Asgard

A Bot’s Beautiful Mess
Rhodey asks Dum-E to hide the ring he bought for Tony. Of course, it’s Dum-E, so it doesn’t exactly go to plan. (Dum-E’s POV; so funny)

Trust
This is sort of shippy, and sort of just Tony getting de-aged to 15 in a fight and freaking out until Rhodey comes to the rescue because he knows Rhodey from MIT already.

Ridiculous
Pepper informs Rhodey of the obvious: he and Tony are completely ridiculous.

Run and Hide
High School AU. Tony’s got a huge crush on Rhodey, and the Homecoming dance is coming up. Only thing is, he’s scared to do anything about it.

Reasons Why
Rhodey finds Tony after the Battle of New York.

Field Trip fics

Tony Stark, Chaperone Extraordinaire
Tony chaperones Peter’s field trip to the science museum.

Academic Commitment
Peter’s class goes on a field trip and things go ever so slightly wrong.

Stark Internship

The Field Trip
The Tower gets broken into and Peter has to do something about it (without Spider-Man).

It Could Have Been Worse

A Little Help Goes A Long Way

Dysfunctional
Peter gets caught up in a whole mess of the impending doom of a field trip to his current place of residence and internship, and busting an old Hydra facility.

Of ID Badges and Artificial Intelligence
Midtown’s field trip to SI nearly turns Peter’s life into a nightmare, but fortunately there are occasionally things that work out in his favor.

It’s Above My Clearance Level

“Peter is biologically Tony’s kid” fics

i’m the satellite (and you’re the sky)
Tony is actually Peter’s dad. (Chaptered)

We are human after all
More of the same because I found out who dies in Infinity War and I am Not Happy. (Series; first part chaptered, sequel oneshots)

My Son, My Sun
A baby gets dropped on Tony’s doorstep just before the events of Iron Man. He doesn’t want anything to do with the kid until he’s kidnapped in Afghanistan and realizes that for the first time maybe in his life… he has a family to go home to. (Contains Stony)

Kid fics

Peter Parker’s Homecoming
Domestic AU where Peter gets adopted by Tony and Stephen Stark-Strange.

Spider-Baby of mine
Frickin’ adorable oneshot of de-aged baby Peter being coddled and smooched by pretty much all of the Avengers (especially Tony, because duh).

My boy
Tony’s no good with kids, but a sad little boy on a field trip to SI might change his mind.

The Face In The Papers
Tony just wanted to get a Captain America Happy Meal for his kid. The press has other plans.

Under the weather
Baby(toddler-ish) Peter gets the flu and Tony flies halfway across the world to be there for him (contains Stony).

Baby Maybe
3 year old Peter has a nightmare and wakes up crying.

MIT-era fics

Masquerading as a Man with a Reason
Let’s just say Teenage College Student Tony was a bit of a walking nightmare. Being his roommate is basically just being a glorified babysitter. See also: The Noodle Incident. (Part of a series featuring Tony adopting Peter; I wasn’t wild about the series itself, but I loved this oneshot.)

Deposit Security
Socially awkward college baby Tony evidently needs a lot of positive reinforcement. Rhodey’s pretty good at giving it.

Falling Head Over Heels For You
Soulmate AU. Tony has a recurring feeling that makes him do weird things trying to follow it, and more often than not it results in him falling on the floor and taking whatever happens to be a little too close down with him.

Holiday fics

messy chocolate frosting
Peter’s birthday

Tony Stark’s Epic Birthday Bash
Peter enlists the Avengers to help plan a birthday party for Tony

99 red balloons
Tony’s birthday

Happy Birthday, Tony!
Tony’s birthday

Happy Father’s Day!
….Father’s Day

I don’t really think that’s criticism
Father’s Day

of jaws and birthdays
It’s Peter’s birthday, and there’s some fun stuff planned for him, but first he has go get his jaw reset. Yay.

Series

Irondad and Spiderson (fave)
MCU series about Tony being a father figure for Peter.

Iron Dad & Spider-Son
Much like the above.

what you were then I am today
The story of Tony’s struggle to connect with Peter when he adopts him after May dies. They adopt Maggie the Wonder Dog, for starters.

Baby Mine
12 chapters plus a oneshot alternate ending of de-aged baby Peter being and coddled and smooched, this time mostly by Tony… and Happy, if you can believe it. A little bit of angst, as well, but only for a couple chapters.

Peter Parker: Future Hearts
Series mostly about Peter’s relationship with the Avengers, but also Tony adopting him when May dies; can get pretty angsty at some parts.

The Post-IW Life
What it says on the tin.

Exposed
A series about various ways Peter accidentally tells everyone he’s Spider-Man.

Because Peter’s Basically Tony’s Son
Series, ongoing (oneshots)

Peter & Bucky Are Pals
Cute series of Peter befriending Bucky… sort of on accident. There’s also a Hair Club and Peter Protection Service.

Peter Parker Is Bisexual
Peter opens up to Tony about something, and Tony is very supportive (and also gleefully teasing) (it’s really cute and silly, it’s just Tony tickling Peter and teasing him about his crush and then his date and then his boyfriend)

Avenger Adventures
The Avengers’ observances of Tony and Peter’s apparent father-son relationship

Asexual!Peter
Tony helps Peter settle into the identity that he’s just now learning doesn’t make him defective.

Let The World Know (Peter Is Tony’s Son)
A collection of unrelated oneshots, ranging from Peter being biologically Tony and Pepper’s son, to Tony acting as a father figure. There’s something for everyone in here, honestly.

Chaptered fics

My Soul To Keep
Movie night after the events of Infinity War (plus events of the author’s post-film hcs).

Stay in School, Kid
The Avengers teach a week-long workshop at Peter’s high school, and he hates it… at first. MJ helps him out a bit.

5 Times Peter Thought Tony Was Mad
Tony loves his exasperating kid.

Hulk Friend!
Peter befriends Hulk (in the cutest way possible) because he knows a lonely 5 year old when he sees one.

the rattle of their hearts
The author’s take on Infinity War part 2 (it’s so so good but also so so long and I regret reading it all in one night)

And You’ll Blow Us All Away
May dies and Tony adopts Peter, featuring almost 60,000 words and a whole lotta angst. But also a lot of fluff.

Dad for a Day
It’s “take your dad to school for the science fair” day. Peter doesn’t think it’s gonna be a very fun day for him, until he tells Tony about it.

Iconic
Peter and Shuri are introduced and the Gen Z Vine Meme Twins are born.

I’m Right Here
Peter comes back from the dead after Thanos is defeated, gets upset and sick, and basically just gets babied, coddled, and reassured by various Avengers, particularly Tony, Steve, and Bucky, on the ship back to Earth.

5+1 fics

5 Times Everyone Thought Spider-Man was Iron Man’s Favorite Superhero
Plus one time Tony confirmed it.

Eggshells
5 times Peter indulged in his stress baking habit, and 1 time Tony did it for him.

Five Times Peter was Tony’s Son and One Time Tony was his Dad
5+1 of Tony accidentally (then on purpose) being Peter’s dad.

Carry On Wayward Son
The Avengers are desperate to know who it is that Stark is trying to protect.

5 Times Peter is stuck with Tony
5+1 of Tony and Peter getting stuck in various places (It’s mostly hilarious, with some angst added in just for balance).

Four Times Steve Didn’t Meet Peter
Steve has never met Tony’s kid, but he’s already fond of him.

The Five Times Peter Denies an Illness or Injury + the One Time He Doesn’t
Peter doesn’t like admitting it when he’s sick.

Long oneshots (5000+)

Spider gone rogue
Peter feels suffocated by parental control and hacks his suit for a few days and bad things happen.

A Night To Remember
MJ asks Peter to prom.

Serendipity
May breaks her leg so Peter stays with Tony (it ends with [happy-not-tragic-situation] adoption; good stuff).

Who Saves The Hero
May’s new boyfriend makes Peter uncomfortable. He finds out why soon enough.

and then redemption
Peter accidentally befriends Loki. Flash is a not-so-closet Spiderman fan.

Packing Heat
Flash gives Peter a lot of crap for being trans. Tony’s not here for that at all.

A Different Sky
Tony and Peter go on a mission in the Midwest. Peter’s never seen the stars. Tony hates the sky. They stargaze.

Coming Home
5+1 where everyone assumes Ned and Peter are dating, but they’re not (until they are)

A Cautionary Tale
Peter makes a mistake on a mission and gets hurt. Tony reacts pretty badly.

…I’m in Love
Karen suggests Peter has a crush. On Ned. And now he can’t stop thinking about it.

The mind melt
Peter’s got a horrific fever.

If You Can’t Catch A Breath (You Can Take The Oxygen Straight Out Of My Own Chest)
A villain buries Peter alive, leaving Tony rushing to get him out before he runs out of oxygen.

Bold Enough To Fall On My Face When I Walk
Peter gets hurt doing something Tony very specifically told him not to do.

5 Times Peter Sleepwalked And The 1 Time He Pretended He Did
Peter sleepwalks. It’s absolutely, without question, the cutest problem Tony has ever had to deal with.

A Tool (To Save Yourself)
Tony has an idea to make something to help Peter through panic attacks. Peter has an idea to help the rest of the world.

Mid-length oneshots (2500-5000)

Wisdom lost, wisdom found
Peter gets his wisdom teeth pulled and gives the Avengers multiple collective heart attacks while high on pain meds.

Parental Obligations
Peter gets a cold. May’s upstate, so Tony brings him back to the Tower.

drunk spider situation
Peter has a nightmare and deals with it Tony-style… and Tony has to deal with it. (it’s funnier than it sounds.)

star child
Tony takes Peter to Coney Island so he can just be a kid for a while.

1:03 AM
Peter doesn’t want to deal with nightmares so he focuses on everything else and works himself into a panic attack instead.

I Think There’s Been A Little Mix Up
Peter and Tony somehow switch bodies.

Peter’s Science Fair
Tony and Steven (Strange) are married and Peter’s their kid and they surprise him at his science fair

Repeat After Me
Rhodey finds out who Peter is (in a rather unconventional and accidental way)

What Do Sick Teenagers Do?
Peter gets sick and his school doesn’t believe Tony is a legitimate emergency contact.

Sleepless Nights and Restless Dreams
Peter can’t sleep.

To My Son
Being taught to shave by your dad is a teenage boy’s rite of passage… one that Peter didn’t think he would get.

Insomnia
The insomnia is real with these two.

#RoleModelStark2018
Oh look another “Peter returns from the dead” fic

Soccer Mom Moment
Tony’s taking Peter to a conference. Peter needs a haircut.

Have Mercy On Me, Mercy My Heart
Tony tries to figure out what he can do to help Peter.

am i what you wanted
Peter doesn’t want MJ to find out that he’s Spiderman, but things don’t always go according to plan, and he rocks up to movie night at Ned’s with a GSW.

Spider Mom
Nobody expected Peter to turn Natasha into Spider Mom.

Peter Parker’s Top Surgery Fund
Peter and Ned try to raise money for Peter’s top surgery without telling Tony. He finds out anyway. With only minor confusion as to what top surgery is.

You See The Same Eyes In Different People
Peter reminds Bucky a lot of Steve. He gives Bucky the same intense desire to protect.

In A Matter of Minutes
Flash takes a seemingly harmless pool game way too far. Once again, it’s Iron Dad to the rescue.

searching for my father’s power
Tony’s having a rough time, but his little found family helps. Even when Peter is convinced that Tony going into cardiac arrest is his fault.

We’re There, Kid
Tony is possibly the best mentor/almost-parental figure ever, and Peter wonders if they’re at hug-level yet.

The Octopus Files
Peter catches the flu. May warns Tony about Octopus Mode, but doesn’t bother telling him what it means. He finds out soon enough, anyway.

Just Hug Your Father
Ned goads Peter to hug his Tonydad. Peter has a teensy bit of a nervous breakdown.

I Will Soften Every Edge
According to FRIDAY, Tony is Peter’s dad. Not biologically. Just scientifically.

And You’re Miles Away
Some of the phone calls Peter and Tony make to each other during Peter’s first few months of college. (yo, this one actually made me cry a little bit, and I don’t do that very often. some of Peter’s feelings are very similar to feelings I have all the time, and I haven’t even worked up the courage to do any college/adult stuff yet like he has.)

mr. sandman
Steve’s got a big soft spot for the insomniac Spider-Kid.

Not-super-short-but-still-short oneshots (1000-2500)

You’re Okay, Kid
Peter has a stress-induced panic attack and he and Tony play I Spy.

Spidey Senses
Peter’s got horrendous sensory overload.

Into the Driver’s Seat Tonight
Peter’s first driving lesson starts out ok… but it ends in a way that’s less than ideal.

Making A Show of It
Peter asks for an access key to get jerks off his back. Of course, Tony doesn’t do things half-way.

What’s It Called When Spiderman Climbs Walls?
Peter and MJ make it “Instagram Official”.
